root: ^The Prof.: “Ha-ha. It has become so clear to me.”
^The Prof.: “All this time, we’ve had a similar origin ‘The One’.”
^The Prof.: “I’ve not been healing anything. I’m worthless to them.”
^The Prof.: “All I did was let them down.”
^The Prof.: “Why did you tamper with their timelines !?”
^The Prof.: “The look in her eyes! The pain in her heart!”
^The Prof.: “A thick veil for Dolph! He grew into a lapdog because of ‘you’!”
^The Prof.: “And Grugg…I can’t even believe what you did to him.”
^The Prof.: “Broke his mind to the point of being a mute!”
^The Prof.: “Was this what ‘you’ wanted!? For us to Fight ‘you’!?”
^The Prof.: “For what? Was crushing Metronomia under your thumb not enough!?”
^Black background is replaced with current background of the landmass
^Dolph is on the right, the Professor is on the left
^The Prof.: “Stop talking about it! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!”
^The Prof.: “It’s impossible. All hope is lost. ‘The One’ has finally taken shape and it’s all my fault!”
^The Prof.: “Metronomia will collapse! All of time! All of existence will collapse into ‘him’!”
^Dolph: “Get ahold of yourself! Metronomia needs us!”
^‘The One’  appears in the middle of the screen.
^This is when the music begins to swell up
^The world is shaking. (move the background and characters to achieve this effect
